element.name: mysql-jdbc-url
element.description: Please specify the jdbc url of mysql e.g. jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/test

element.name: mysql-username
element.description: Please enter the username of mysql

element.name: mysql-password
element.description: Please enter the password of mysql

element.name: mybatis-mapper-locations
element.description: Please specify the mapperLocations e.g. com/mycompany/myapp

element.name: topLevelPackage
element.description: Please specify the top-level package e.g. com.mycompany.myapp
